snippet: In Ormoc, more than 90 percent of the structures are said to have been destroyed or damaged, and food shortages are becoming an increasing problem.
lead_paragraph: In Ormoc, more than 90 percent of the structures are said to have been destroyed or damaged, and food shortages are becoming an increasing problem.

headline.main: Overshadowed by Tacloban, Other Devastated Philippine Cities Fear Aid Will Not Come
headline.print_headline: Overshadowed by Tacloban, Other Devastated Philippine Cities Fear Aid Will Not Come
